plot: A woman desperate to boost her social media score hits the jackpot when she's invited to a swanky wedding, but the trip doesn't go as planned.

A woman who lives in a world where most people are completely overwhelmed by the madness of being popular and important in social reding earns an invitation from her best childhood friend to her marriage, but certain unexpected occasions will try to stop her from reaching In her destiny, had she been able to attend the wedding?—joão vitor neves

A young woman whose life depends on a social media platform where you rate one another, is happily invited to a wedding. But as she attempts to make it, many things go wrong along the way. She takes you on her journey through the pastel and futuristic ways of this life called 'Nosedive'—kawaiiunicornzzz

In a world where being popular means everything, almost anything depends on it and people rate everyone they see on a scale of 1-5, a woman is invited to a wedding, things go wrong along the way and her popularity goes down, she is no longer wanted to attend the wedding and goes insane
